sources.title: 186 Dollars To Freedom 2013 BRXD
sources.description: A young California surfer has to grow up in a hurry when he is thrown into a Peruvian political prison in 1980.

metadata.Plot: A young California surfer, Wayne Montgomery, gets framed on phony drug charges and thrown into a Peruvian political prison for communist dissidents in 1980. Wayne encounters a series of eccentric and dangerous characters in prison who compel him to grow up in a hurry and find a way to escape. Based on a true story.
metadata.Actors: John Robinson, Michael DeLorenzo, Alex Meraz
